instruction: Create a Blueprint with a boolean variable IsActive. On BeginPlay, use a Branch node to check IsActive. If true, print Active. If false, print Inactive.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_BranchCheck
PARENT: Actor
VAR IsActive: Bool = true
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=IsActive]
NODE n3: Branch
NODE n4: PrintString [InString="Active"]
NODE n5: PrintString [InString="Inactive"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n3.True -> n4.Execute
EXEC n3.False -> n5.Execute
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_ConditionalExample
PARENT: Actor
CATEGORY: Gameplay
VAR IsActive: Bool = true
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=IsActive]
NODE n3: Branch
NODE n4: PrintString [InString="Active"]
NODE n5: PrintString [InString="Inactive"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n3.True -> n4.Execute
EXEC n3.False -> n5.Execute }
raw_output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_ConditionalExample
PARENT: Actor
CATEGORY: Gameplay
VAR IsActive: Bool = true
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=IsActive]
NODE n3: Branch
NODE n4: PrintString [InString="Active"]
NODE n5: PrintString [InString="Inactive"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n3.True -> n4.Execute
EXEC n3.False -> n5.Execute }

instruction: Create a Blueprint that on overlap checks if the overlapping actor has the tag Enemy. If yes, print Danger. If no, print Safe.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_TagBranch
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: ActorHasTag [Tag="Enemy"]
NODE n3: Branch
NODE n4: PrintString [InString="Danger"]
NODE n5: PrintString [InString="Safe"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n1.OtherActor -> n2.Target [Actor]
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n3.True -> n4.Execute
EXEC n3.False -> n5.Execute
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_TagCheck
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: GetActorHasTag [TagName="Enemy"]
NODE n3: Branch
NODE n4: PrintString [InString="Danger"]
NODE n5: PrintString [InString="Safe"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n1.OtherActor -> n2.Target [Actor]
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n3.True -> n4.Execute
EXEC n3.False -> n5.Execute {

PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph

instruction: Create a Blueprint with an integer variable Score set to 0. On BeginPlay, set Score to 100 then print the value of Score.

VAR Score: Int = 0
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: VariableSet [VarName=Score]
NODE n3: VariableGet [VarName=Score]
NODE n4: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
DATA 100 -> n2.Value [Int]
EXEC n2.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n3.Value -> n4.InString [String]

NODE n3: GetVariable [VarName=Score]
NODE n4: PrintString

EXEC n2.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n3.Value -> n4.In [String] {

instruction: Create a Blueprint where pressing Interact opens a gate and pressing Fire enters the gate to toggle visibility.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_GateToggle
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_InputAction [ActionName="Interact"]
NODE n2: Gate
NODE n3: Event_InputAction [ActionName="Fire"]
NODE n4: ToggleVisibility
EXEC n1.Pressed -> n2.Open
EXEC n3.Pressed -> n2.Enter
EXEC n2.Exit -> n4.Execute
actual_dsl:

PARENT: Actor
CATEGORY: Gameplay
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_InputAction [ActionName="Interact"]
NODE n2: Gate
NODE n3: Event_InputAction [ActionName="Fire"]
NODE n4: SetActorHiddenInGame [bNewHidden=false]
NODE n5: SetActorHiddenInGame [bNewHidden=true]
EXEC n1.Pressed -> n2.Open
EXEC n3.Pressed -> n2.Enter
EXEC n2.Exit -> n4.Execute
EXEC n2.Exit -> n5.Execute }

NODE n4: SetActorHiddenInGame [bNewHidden=false]
NODE n5: SetActorHiddenInGame [bNewHidden=true]
EXEC n1.Pressed -> n2.Open
EXEC n3.Pressed -> n2.Enter
EXEC n2.Exit -> n4.Execute
EXEC n2.Exit -> n5.Execute }

instruction: Create a Blueprint that on Tick gets the distance to the player. If the distance is less than 500, print Close.

BLUEPRINT: BP_DistanceCheck
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph

NODE n3: GetDistanceTo
NODE n4: LessThan [B=500.0]

DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.OtherActor [Actor]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.A [Float]

EXEC n5.True -> n6.Execute

DATA
